I place an emphasis on promoting interpersonal relations in both professional and private settings, and constantly aspire to maintain a proactive environment that encourages positive growth. Summary Public policy and government affairs professional specialising in internet policy and political outreach. Over 6 years experience executing policy campaigns and effectively managing high profile complex business issues.  
 
Working for Google, I tackle some of the toughest challenges of the information age at the often fraught intersection of politics, policy, and new technology. My role is to develop and lead campaigns to achieve Google’s public policy and regulatory goals; utilising legislative, public affairs, and media strategies. 
 
Experience 
*Campaigns - political outreach, public affairs, grassroots, and third-party relations 
*Messaging on complex issues that resonates and sways people 
*Designing and implementing public policy outreach strategies 
*Engagement at the highest levels of political office 
 
Skills 
*Economics of the web, innovation and productivity 
*Policy for technology and an open web (from competition to privacy to copyright) 
*All things Google
